description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,0)=T(n,2n)=1 for n >= 0, T(n,1)=0 for n >= 1, T(n,2)=1 for n >= 2 and for n >= 3, T(n,k)=T(n-1,k-3)+T(n-1, k-2)+T(n-1,k-1) for 3<=k<=2n-1. T(n,k)=0 for k<0 or k>2n.
comments: The following sequences all have the same parity: A004737, A006590, A027052, A071028, A071797, A078358, A078446. - _Jeremy Gardiner_, Mar 16 2003
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Offset and keyword:tabl corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 01 2009
